response.original_title: The Rainbow Serpent: Dawn of the New Age Beyond 2012
response.overview: The Rainbow Serpent is a powerful and ancient energy current that travels around the world from Uluru (Ayres Rock, Australia) linking Planetary Chakras. The Aborigines knew this serpent well, their age old stories tell of two serpents; a female snake Kuniya and her nephew Liru, who meet at Uluru. The Rainbow Serpent feature documentary encompasses one man's five year pilgrimage. Join Tor Webster in his travels around the earth's chakra points, communicating and exploring global unity consciousness and discussing spirituality with tribal elders and sacred rites with the local spiritual communities.
response.title: The Rainbow Serpent: Dawn of the New Age
